name: PythonRunProcessor
GoogleAIModel

input.content:
Write a bash script to rename all files of the form "merged_*" to "finished_*". 
I want to call it by running bash rename.sh /path/to/files.

output:
```bash
#!/bin/bash

# Check if the input directory exists
if [ ! -d "$1" ]; then
  echo "Error: Directory $1 does not exist"
  exit 1
fi

# Rename all files of the form "merged_*" to "finished_*"
find "$1" -name "merged_*" -exec rename 's/merged_/finished_/' {} \;

echo "Files renamed successfully"
```
